info.name: Tumblr - Pusheen Theme
info.description:
Preview here (http://i44.tinypic.com/b84qdu.jpg)

Changes the default blue scheme into a pink-and-salmon Pusheen theme.
info.additionalInfo: Coding from style 55428 and Pusheen dashboard icons from style 52466. Pusheen belongs to Pusheen at Tumblr.
